questions.question: It …………………… for the past month.
questions.description: The present perfect is more common with the time expressions for and since.

questions.question: Fossil fuels ………………………… coal and petrol are harmful to the environment.
questions.description: We use such as to give examples.

questions.question: The girl ....................... is sitting in that corner is my neighbor’s daughter.
questions.description: We use who to refer to people.

questions.question: You …………………………. pay for that drink.
questions.description: When need is a modal auxiliary verb, questions and negatives are made without do.

questions.question: You ......................... get a second opinion.
questions.description: Had better is used to give strong advice.

questions.question: None of these answers …………………………… correct.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after none.

questions.question: She doesn’t have ………………………. friends.
questions.description: Not any means the same as no.

questions.question: Things are getting …………………..
questions.description: Worse is the comparative form of bad.

questions.question: We lost the deal ………………………….. your obstinacy.
questions.description: Because of is a preposition. It is followed by a noun.
